statements: DELETE FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE id = 1 AND app_name = 'Salesforce';
DELETE FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE connection_type = 'API' AND last_sync_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CRMData WHERE data_category = 'Contacts' AND last_sync < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 month';
DELETE FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE sync_interval > INTERVAL '1 day';
DELETE FROM CRMData WHERE customer_id = 'a1234567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM DataIntegrationLogs WHERE status = 'FAILED' AND timestamp < '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM IntegrationLogs WHERE app_id = 1 AND crm_id = 2;
DELETE FROM crm_connections WHERE connection_id = 'ABC123' AND connection_type = 'Type A';
DELETE FROM crm_data_sync WHERE connection_id = 'XYZ789' AND data_table = 'customers';
